description: A heavy mattress-like armor of cloth, leather, and thick linings of Kevlar, originally used as horse protection for bullfighting.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral, and croupiere made from biosilicified chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral, and croupiere made from chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A heavy covering of chainmail, suitably made for elephants as protection.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

name.str: boiled leather elephant barding with caparison
name.str_pl: boiled leather elephant bardings with caparison

description: A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts a battle between a monstrous demon and a regal warrior astride an elephant and wielding an elaborate vajra.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

snippet_category.text: A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts a battle between a monstrous demon and a regal warrior astride an elephant and wielding an elaborate vajra.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts a being, a goddess?  with many arms bearing different items with one large uncovered breast on the left side.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts several charging elephants trampling enemy soldiers.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts an assortment of diamonds and gems.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts a man in rich garments and a full uncovered belly, riding in an elaborate chariot.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts several identical smiling men in turbans of various bright colors performing a dance.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

A full barding for elephants, consisting of boiled leather with cloth underneath.  This caparison depicts a fierce, three-horned dinosaur bursting out the side of a 1970s-era van.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.

name.str: boiled leather elephant barding with bones
name.str_pl: boiled leather elephant bardings with bones

description: Leather elephant barding with decorative bones affixed, meant to invoke fear in bandits and raiders and traders all!  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A thin plastic covering, adapted to protect an elephant from acid zombie splashes and similar caustic substances.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A very large warm wool sweater with a festive holiday pattern.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A heavy covering of strategically placed iron plates and leather, suitably made for elephants as protection.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A heavy covering of steel plate and leather, suitably made for elephants as protection.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
A heavy covering of strategically placed bronze plates and leather, suitably made for elephants as protection.  You could put this on a friendly elephant.
